sentences.translation: 然后，它们像超新星一样爆炸。

sentences.sentence: Smaller light echoes have been seen around supernovae.
sentences.translation: 规模较小的光回音可在超新星附近看见。

sentences.sentence: Now this path to supernovae will have to be investigated in more detail.
sentences.translation: 现在，这条产生超新星的途径必须要得到更加仔细的研究。
